name: LD40 - This is not a reference
name_original: LD40 - This is not a reference
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 40.

You are running down the street for some reason that nobody knows, try to pick all the items to get points, some of them will make you immune to damage, but be aware, the more items you get, the faster it becomes. And don’t forget the most important part… dodge the vehicles!

How to play:

  • W to jump
  • S to crouch and to fall down faster

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/this-is-not-a-reference

Windows version download: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1J2OAAhMpwjno_krL-q8Piup1qHjdOj_2
